mapper.select:
SELECT c.fContactPerson AS 'customerInfo',
FROM t_friendly_link fl JOIN t_customer c ON fl.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid WHERE fl.fWebsiteUuid = #{friendlyLinkCriteria.websiteUuid}
AND fl.fFriendlyLinkIsCheck = 1
AND fl.fFriendlyLinkIsCheck = 2
AND fl.fFriendlyLinkWebName LIKE '${friendlyLinkCriteria.friendlyLinkWebName}%'
AND fl.fFriendlyLinkUrl LIKE '%${friendlyLinkCriteria.friendlyLinkUrl}%'
AND c.fContactPerson LIKE '${friendlyLinkCriteria.customerInfo}%'
AND fl.fExpirationTime < NOW()

SELECT c.fContactPerson AS 'customerInfo',
FROM t_friendly_link fl JOIN t_customer c ON fl.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid WHERE fl.fUuid = #{uuid}
